General
cmake, expect(scripting language), Selenium, apache bench, jmeter

sections.title: Education

projects.description: Tired of choosing music suitable for your mood? All radio stations have too wide repertory, contain ads or broadcast in low quality? There is a solution - Online Radio, android application for playing online audio streams. Offers hundreds of stations in high quality. Radio stations are separated by genre, including different genres of electronic rock, pop, and classical music. If your connection is unstable, its not a problem! You don't need to take your phone from your pocket to press play button, Online Radio will resume automatically when internet become available, is it was interrupted.
projects.duties: Developed and published entire application from scratch
projects.name: Internet Radio
projects.stack: Java, Android SDK, MediaSession API, ExoPlayer, active-android, picasso, leakcanary, android-support-library, Gson, Retrofit, RxJava
